finalMessage.title: END OF CODE
finalMessage.content: If you read it, act. If you act, measure. If you measure, lead.
finalMessage.closing: Costa Digital: the future is built from here.

preamble.title: PREAMBLE
content: We are the Caribbean Order that chooses technology to transform realities.
We don't wait for the future: we build it from here.

mission.title: II. CENTRAL MISSION
content: Turn the Caribbean into Colombia's new tech epicenter:

practice.title: III. PRACTICE PRECEPTS
items: Sharing knowledge is law: document, open, teach.
Collaboration is the way: those who add up win.
Rigor distinguishes us: we measure, iterate, improve.
Diversity is advantage: more perspectives = better solutions.
Culture is the engine: we create technology with Caribbean flavor.
Coherence is power: what we say, we do.

mastery.title: IV. CRAFT MASTERY
items: Raise the standard with every delivery.

leadership.title: V. LEADERSHIP (FROM LEADER TO VOLUNTEER)
items: Give credit in public; correct in private.
Delegate with clarity; demand with respect.
Care for the common brand over personal shine.
Train someone who can replace you.

rules.title: VI. HOUSE RULES
items: Every event has purpose, metrics, and published learning.
No sponsorship is negotiated without common mandate.
The calendar is sacred: coordination before broadcast.
The Costa Digital brand is used with honor or not used.

prohibited.title: VII. PROHIBITED CONDUCT
items: ✗ Protagonism that detracts from the community.
✗ Shortcuts that compromise ethics or security.

pact.title: VIII. PACT WITH THE CITIES
content: Barranquilla, Cartagena, Santa Marta and the entire Caribbean:
we bring knowledge, opportunities and networks;
we return with trained talent and living projects.

oath.title: IX. MEMBER'S OATH
content: "From the Caribbean and for the world,
I swear to learn, build and share.
I swear to honor ethics, community and excellence.
I swear to turn our Caribbean into a technology epicenter."
